page.title: 04 INDUSTRY 2
page.content: Rowhedge side of the river. {Wivenhoe {Port}employs people and can handle up to 500 ships a year, the largest of which is 250 feet long with a depth of l4 feet. General cargoes include timber, coal, steel, grain, fertiliser and animal feeds. Most boats come from the near Continent and the Eastern Block countries. {Rowhedge Quay}employs between 20 and 50 people and can handle up to 400 ships a year. Like{Wivenhoe Port}they handle general cargoe but specialise in granite blocks for paving. The main cargoe going out is grain. If they are unloading animal feed and the wind is S.E. the smell overwhelms the school!
